messages.firsttrisememsterNote: Note : First trimester (weeks 1-12): This is the time when the baby's major organs and systems are forming. The mother may experience morning sickness, fatigue, and food cravings.
messages.secondtrisememsterNote: Note : Second trimester (weeks 13-28): This is the time when the baby grows rapidly and the mother may start to feel the baby's movements. The mother may also `experience heartburn, constipation, and varicose veins.
messages.thirdtrisememsterNote: Note : Third trimester (weeks 29-40): This is the time when the baby gets ready for birth. The mother may experience swelling, shortness of breath, and Braxton Hicks contractions.
